title: What Next TBD: Can America Fix Its Trains?
description:
America used to be at the vanguard of railroad technology. What went wrong? And can the new infrastructure bill fix our broken system?

Guests: Alon Levy and Eric Goldwyn of the Marron Institute at NYU 

Host
Henry Grabar
 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:title: What Next TBD: Can America Fix Its Trains?
itunes:author: Slate Podcasts
itunes:subtitle: To make a real difference, we first need to learn how to spend the money well.
